name: Burning Draw (Skill)
text:
Can be used from your 5th turn and onward, when you have 2300 or less Life Points. Pay Life Points to make your Life Points equal to 100, and add a card to your hand from the top of your Deck for each 1000 Life Points you paid.
This Skill can only be used if you begin the Duel with a Deck (excluding Extra Deck) that contains at least 10 "Salamangreat" cards. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
